dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Official Idenfifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Information related to the official identification of the clu, typically in human readable form. Used to officially reference or publish.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Code
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The composite string that is used to officially reference or publish the CLU. Note it may have an internal structure that each Institution may want to enforce. This structure may be composed from the other parts of the structure such as Level & Division, but may include items such as cluType.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Short Name
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Abbreviated name of the CLU, commonly used on transcripts

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Long Name
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Full name of the CLU, commonly used on catalogues

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Level
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: A code that indicates whether this is introductory, advanced, etc.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Division
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: A code that indicates what school, program, major, subject area, etc. Examples: "Chem", "18"

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Suffix Code
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The "extra" portion of the code, which usually corresponds with the most detailed part of the number. Ex. at MIT we might map Division to subject area(Ex:6) but overall we need to say the code is 6.120. This field would represent the 120 part.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Variation
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: A number that indicates the sequence or order of versions in cases where several different Clus have the same offical Identifier

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Organization Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The identifier of the organization associated with this cluIdentifier.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: CLU Identifier Type
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Identifies the type of usage for the identifier. While most usages will have the same data constraints, this may provide some context around what the specific intent is for this identifier. (Ex. Why does this alternate identifier exist?)

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: CLU Identifier State
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Identifies the state of the identifier. Values for this field are constrained to values present within the cluIdentifierState enumeration.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: CLU Identifier Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Identifies the particular identifier structure. This is set by the service to be able to determine changes and alterations to the structure as well as provides a handle for searches. This structure is not accessible through unique operations, and it is strongly recommended that no external references to this particular identifier be maintained.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Alternate Idenfifiers
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Information related to alternate identifications of the clu, typically in human readable form. Used to reference or publish.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Code
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The composite string that is used to officially reference or publish the CLU. Note it may have an internal structure that each Institution may want to enforce. This structure may be composed from the other parts of the structure such as Level & Division, but may include items such as cluType.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Short Name
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Abbreviated name of the CLU, commonly used on transcripts

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Long Name
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Full name of the CLU, commonly used on catalogues

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Level
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: A code that indicates whether this is introductory, advanced, etc.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Division
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: A code that indicates what school, program, major, subject area, etc. Examples: "Chem", "18"

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Suffix Code
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The "extra" portion of the code, which usually corresponds with the most detailed part of the number. Ex. at MIT we might map Division to subject area(Ex:6) but overall we need to say the code is 6.120. This field would represent the 120 part.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Variation
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: A number that indicates the sequence or order of versions in cases where several different Clus have the same offical Identifier

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Organization Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The identifier of the organization associated with this cluIdentifier.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: CLU Identifier Type
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Identifies the type of usage for the identifier. While most usages will have the same data constraints, this may provide some context around what the specific intent is for this identifier. (Ex. Why does this alternate identifier exist?)

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: CLU Identifier State
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Identifies the state of the identifier. Values for this field are constrained to values present within the cluIdentifierState enumeration.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: CLU Identifier Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Identifies the particular identifier structure. This is set by the service to be able to determine changes and alterations to the structure as well as provides a handle for searches. This structure is not accessible through unique operations, and it is strongly recommended that no external references to this particular identifier be maintained.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Academic Subject Orgs
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The organizations that represents the Subject area of the Clu, if different from the PrimaryAdminOrg?

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Organization Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for an organization.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Study Subject Area
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The Study Subject Area is used to identify the area of study associated with the clu. It may be a general study area (e.g. Chemistry) or very specific (e.g. Naval Architecture) depending on the level of specificity of the clu.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Description
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Narrative description of the CLU, used for the catalog.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Plain Text
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Plain version of the text. This may be used for searching.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Formatted Text
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Formatted version of the text.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: List of Campus Locations
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Places where this clu might be offered

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Accreditations
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Information around the accreditation of the clu.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Organization Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for an organization. This organization is the body behind the accreditation.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Effective Date
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Date and time the accreditation became effective. This is a similar concept to the effective date on enumerated values. When an expiration date has been specified, this field must be less than or equal to the expiration date.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Expiration Date
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Date and time that this accreditation expires. This is a similar concept to the expiration date on enumerated values. If specified, this should be greater than or equal to the effective date. If this field is not specified, then no expiration date has been currently defined and should automatically be considered greater than the effective date.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Create/Update meta info
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Version Indicator
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: An indicator of the version of the thing being described with this meta information. This is set by the service implementation and will be used to determine conflicts in updates.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Date/Time Created
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The date and time the thing being described with this meta information was created

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Created By Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The principal who created the thing being described with this meta information

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Date/Time Last Updated
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The date and time the thing being described with this meta information was last updated. This would be filled in on initial creation as well.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Updated By Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The principal who last updated the thing being described with this meta information. This would be filled in on initial creation as well.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Accreditation Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Identifier for the accreditation.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Admin Org
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The primary organization (typically, an academic department) with administrative oversight over the CLU. This will be used for Authorization and Workflow.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Organization Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for an organization.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Alternate Admin Orgs
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: For situations where more than one Organization shares in the Administration of this clu. This will be used in Authorization and Workflow

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Organization Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for an organization.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Primary Instructor
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Primary potential instructor for the clu. This is primarily for use in advertising the clu and may not be the actual instructor.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Organization Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for an organization. This indicates which organization this individual is associated with for the purposes of this clu.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Person Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for a person record.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Instructors
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Instructors associated with this clu. This may not be an exhaustive list, and instead may only be used to indicate potential instructors in publication.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Organization Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for an organization. This indicates which organization this individual is associated with for the purposes of this clu.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Person Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for a person record.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Expected First ATP
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The expected first academic time period that this clu would be effective. This may not reflect the first "real" academic time period for this clu.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Effective Date
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Date and time the CLU became effective. This is a similar concept to the effective date on enumerated values. When an expiration date has been specified, this field must be less than or equal to the expiration date.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Expiration Date
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Date and time that this CLU expires. This is a similar concept to the expiration date on enumerated values. If specified, this should be greater than or equal to the effective date. If this field is not specified, then no expiration date has been currently defined and should automatically be considered greater than the effective date.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Intensity
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The expected level of time commitment between the student and the CLU meetings.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Unit Type
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The kind of units associated with the quantity, such as hours/week. It is expected that in usage in other structures, this value will always be enumerated based on that context.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Unit Quantity
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The amount of units. Allowed values consist of numeric values as well as the string "unbounded".

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Standard Duration
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The standard duration of the learning unit.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Academic Time Period Duration Type Key
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The kind of units associated with the quantity, such as Semesters

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Time Quantity
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The amount of time

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Can Create LUI
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Indicates if the CLU can be used to instantiate LUIs (offerings).

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Reference URL
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: An URL for additional information about the CLU. This could be a reference to a document which might in turn have references to other documents (e.g. course syllabus provided by the faculty or department, standard schedule of classes, etc.).

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: LU Code Info
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: List of LU code info structures. These are structures so that many different types of codes can be associated with the clu. This allows them to be put into categories.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: LU Code Description
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The description of the code.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: LU Code Value
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The code value.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Create/Update meta info
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Version Indicator
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: An indicator of the version of the thing being described with this meta information. This is set by the service implementation and will be used to determine conflicts in updates.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Date/Time Created
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The date and time the thing being described with this meta information was created

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Created By Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The principal who created the thing being described with this meta information

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Date/Time Last Updated
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The date and time the thing being described with this meta information was last updated. This would be filled in on initial creation as well.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Updated By Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The principal who last updated the thing being described with this meta information. This would be filled in on initial creation as well.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: LU Code Type
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for a learning unit code type.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Next Review Period
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: When the next review should be

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Is Enrollable
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Indicates if Luis generated from this Clu are intended to be enrolled in by Students directly

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Offered Academic Time Period Types
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The academic time period types in which this CLU is typically offered. Standard usage would equate to terms. It can define a timeframe that a clu with of a certain stdDuration would fall in.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Has Early Drop Deadline
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Indicates if the CLU has an Early Drop Deadline (EDD). Certain courses are designated as such to maximize access to courses that have historically experienced high demand and high attrition. Default is "false".

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Default Enrollment Estimate
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Default enrollment estimate for this CLU.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Default Maximum Enrollment
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Default maximum enrollment for this CLU.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Is Hazardous For Disabled Students
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Indicates if the CLU may be hazardous for students with disabilities. Would default to "false".

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: feeInfo
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Fee information associated with this CLU.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: List of CLU Fee Records
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: List of clu fee records

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Fee Type
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Any finite sequence of characters with letters, numerals, symbols and punctuation marks. The length can be any natural number between zero or any positive integer.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Fee Amount
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The page currencyAmount Structure does not exist.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: currencyTypeKey
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The kind of units associated with the quantity, such as US Dollars

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: currency Quantity
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The amount of currency

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: List of Affiliated Orgs
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: List of affiliated organizations.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Organization Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for an organization.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: effectiveDate
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Specifies a date with no time component.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: expirationDate
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Specifies a date with no time component.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: percentage
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: A long numeric value without a fractional component.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: CLU Fee Record Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Identifier for the clu fee record.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: accountingInfo
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Accounting information associated with this CLU.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: List of Affiliated Organizations
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: List of affiliated organizations.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Organization Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for an organization.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: effectiveDate
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Specifies a date with no time component.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: expirationDate
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Specifies a date with no time component.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: percentage
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: A long numeric value without a fractional component.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Create/Update meta info
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Version Indicator
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: An indicator of the version of the thing being described with this meta information. This is set by the service implementation and will be used to determine conflicts in updates.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Date/Time Created
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The date and time the thing being described with this meta information was created

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Created By Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The principal who created the thing being described with this meta information

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Date/Time Last Updated
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The date and time the thing being described with this meta information was last updated. This would be filled in on initial creation as well.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Updated By Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The principal who last updated the thing being described with this meta information. This would be filled in on initial creation as well.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Learning Unit Type
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for a learning unit type. Once set at create time, this field may not be updated.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: Learning Unit State
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The current status of the clu. The values for this field are constrained to those in the luState enumeration. A separate setup operation does not exist for retrieval of the meta data around this value. This field may not be updated through updating this structure and must instead be updated through a dedicated operation.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: CLU Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for a Canonical Learning Unit (CLU). This is optional, due to the identifier being set at the time of creation. Once the CLU has been created, this should be seen as required.
